member.name: T:DPCtlUruNet.EnrollmentControl
member.summary: Enrollment GUI control wraps functionality to capture and enroll a user's fingerprints.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.EnrollmentControl.CultureInfo
member.summary: Supports different cultures. Set the culture by sending in the culture's string value, i.e., "en-US".

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.EnrollmentControl.FormatEnrollmentFmd
member.summary:
Minutiae format.
When enrollment of a finger is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.EnrollmentControl.FormatCaptureFid
member.summary:
Image format.
When enrollment of a finger is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.EnrollmentControl.Reader
member.summary:
Current reader.
When enrollment of a finger is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.EnrollmentControl.EnrolledFingerMask
member.summary: Represents the set of fingers that have been enrolled. The right-most digit is the least-significant bit (representing 1), up to the left-most digit is the most-significant bit (representing 1024)

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.EnrollmentControl.DisabledFingerMask
member.summary:
Represents the set of fingers that cannot be enrolled. The right-most digit is the least-significant bit (representing 1), up to the left-most digit is the most-significant bit (representing 1024)
When enrollment of a finger is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.EnrollmentControl.MaxEnrollFingerCount
member.summary:
The maximum number of fingers that can be enrolled.
When enrollment of a finger is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.EnrollmentControl.CapturePriority
member.summary:
Set of Fmds to identify against.
When enrollment of a finger is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.summary: Constructor.

member.summary: Event handler for when a finger is clicked.

member.summary: Enroll a finger.

member.summary: Main enrollment thread.

member.summary: Capture and extract the Fmd.

member.summary: Delete an enrolled finger.

member.summary: Cancels the capture process.

member.summary: Event that is fired when an enrollment has begun.

member.summary: Event that is fired when an enrollment has completed successfully.

member.summary: Event that is fired when a capture has completed successfully.

member.summary: Event that is fired when an enrollment has been canceled.

member.summary: Event that is fired when an enrollment has been deleted.

member.summary: Uses hands to check whether to show mouseover or mouseoff finger images.

member.summary: Draws a smaller set of hands for enrollment mode.

member.summary: Redraws hands using current finger image states.

member.name: T:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl
member.summary: Identification GUI control wraps functionality to capture and identify a user's fingerprint with a set of Fmds.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.CultureInfo
member.summary: Supports different cultures. Set the culture by sending in the culture's string value, i.e., "en-US".

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.Reader
member.summary:
Reader object to use for capture.
When identification is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.MaximumResult
member.summary:
Maximum number of matches to find.
When identification is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.ThresholdScore
member.summary:
Dissimilarity score to use. Identification returns matches with dissimilarity score under this value.
When identification is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.Fmds
member.summary:
Set of Fmds to identify against.
When identification is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.CapturePriority
member.summary:
Set of Fmds to identify against.
When identification is running, setting this property is ignored.

member.name: M:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.#ctor(DPUruNet.Reader,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{DPUruNet.Fmd},System.Int32,System.Int32,DPUruNet.Constants.CapturePriority)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Reader the GUI control should use
priority the reader should be opened with

member.name: M:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.StartIdentification
member.summary: Starts the identification workflow using the first available reader, or a reader passed in with the .Reader property.

member.name: M:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.StopIdentification
member.summary: Stops the identification process.

member.name: M:DPCtlUruNet.IdentificationControl.CaptureExtract
member.summary: Capture and extract the Fmd.

member.summary: Dispose of the Identification control and all child objects.

member.summary: Event that is fired when an Identification has completed successfully.

member.summary: Message types sent to the view.

member.summary: Delegate to capture calls from a different thread.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.ConnectReader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The fingerprint reader is not connected. Connect the reader..

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.Delete
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Are you sure you want to delete this enrolled fingerprint?.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.DeleteTitle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Are You Sure?.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.Enrollment
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to To begin, scan your finger and wait until success is confirmed. Repeat for each of the remaining scans..

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.EnrollmentCanceled
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enrollment Canceled..

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.Introduction
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to To enroll a fingerprint, click a finger on the hands below. It is recommended that you enroll your index finger. Enrolled fingers are highlighted. You may also delete an enrolled fingerprint by clicking a highlighted finger..

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.Introduction2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Scan your finger four times..

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.SubTitle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You may enroll your fingerprints.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.Title
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enroll a Fingerprint.

member.name: P:DPCtlUruNet.Strings.Verification
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to To verify your identity, touch fingerprint reader with any enrolled finger..
